name: Bayesian Model Averaging
description: A parameter estimate (or a prediction of new observations) obtained by averaging the estimates (or predictions) of the different models under consideration, each weighted by its model probability.
x_kb_article:

Ensemble learning. Wikipedia.  [Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ensemble_learning).
